org.springframework.kafka.config

Class MultiMethodKafkaListenerEndpoint<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.kafka.config.AbstractKafkaListenerEndpoint<K,V>
      • org.springframework.kafka.config.MethodKafkaListenerEndpoint<K,V>
        • org.springframework.kafka.config.MultiMethodKafkaListenerEndpoint<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the key type.
    V - the value type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanFactoryAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, KafkaListenerEndpoint

    public class MultiMethodKafkaListenerEndpoint<K,V>
extends MethodKafkaListenerEndpoint<K,V>
    The MethodKafkaListenerEndpoint extension for several POJO methods based on the KafkaHandler.
    Author:
    Gary Russell
    See Also:
    KafkaHandler, DelegatingInvocableHandler

      MultiMethodKafkaListenerEndpoint(java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Method> methods, java.lang.Object bean)
      Construct an instance for the provided methods and bean with no default method.
